data.text: @BDoolan5 @CarmelGiven @springsteen @StevieVanZandt @SpringsteenWA @backstreetsmag I think we all have a Bobby Jean. I know I do, which is part of the appeal. But I think it's about Steve too. Love the song.

@CarmelGiven @springsteen @StevieVanZandt @SpringsteenWA @backstreetsmag “ Bobby Jean was a good song about youthful friendship “ I loved that song when it was released & back then pictured a girl in some motel room with the radio playing . I have loved the song even more since I read it was about @StevieVanZandt . For me that’s who it’s about ... https://t.co/mbvIlALItg
